headline: Does Disney’s Recent Streaming Strategy Shift Present a Buying Opportunity in 2025?
summary: Ever wondered if Walt Disney stock is a hidden gem or if its current price is actually a good deal? You’re not alone. Many investors are asking the same question right now. After a slight gain of 0.2% over the past week, Disney shares have seen a -6.6% drop this past month, and are still down -10.3% over the last year. The market’s perspective seems to be shifting. Recent news about Disney's ongoing streaming strategy, its efforts to revitalize theme park attendance, and bold moves in film...
